translator_notes: Sarah Lacy is a well-known tech journalist who wrote 'Once You're Lucky, Twice You're Good'
The Russian title 'И ботаники делают бизнес' uses 'ботаники' (botanists/nerds), connecting to Chapter 1's title 'Botanical Garden'
Both recommended books deal with tech entrepreneurship themes
